content: materials - 8 skeins of purl soho s plein air 1 67% merino wool and 33% organically grown cotton each skein is 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 1 725 total yards required we used the color teal verdigris - us 5 3 75 mm 24-inch circular needles 2 - a straight cable stitch holder 3 or spare double pointed needle us 5 or smaller gauge 28½ stitches and 32 row = 4 inches in 2 x 2 rib size finished dimensions 18½ inches wide x 76 inches long aubrey baumgartner 4 is a new york based knitwear designer originally from greenwood indiana she moved to new york city to pursue musical theatre but found a home in textile art geometry and bold colors drive her designs and she loves all-over texture using simple knit-purl combos she draws inspiration from her love of nature architecture and history and believes knitting should be as much about the experience as the finished piece aubrey is a wife and mother to two toddlers and a newborn and these days is a naptime knitter she loves being outdoors singing gardening doing arts and crafts with her kiddos and hopes to one day pass her passion for knitting on to them all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/plein-air html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 4 https //www instagram com/midwesthookandneedle/
